author: rooneg
msg: Require the feed url and item url parameters to svn2feed.py, otherwise
we create feeds with empty atom:id elements, which is pretty lame.
(main): Initialize item_url and feed_url to None, and check for that
later on to ensure that they've been specified at the command line.
